Race.SpecificTitle: Rd. Lighting Dist. No. 1 -- 5 Mill - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Road Lighting District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)

Summary:  Renewal of a five (5) mill tax on assessed valuation of all property subject to taxation in Road Lighting District No. 1 of Ascension Parish, Louisiana, for a period of ten (10) years, for the purpose of lighting improvements and maintenance in the District.
Race.FullText: Shall Road Lighting District No. 1 of the Parish of Ascension, State of Louisiana (the "District"), under the provisions of Article VI, Sections 30 and 32 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, as amended, La. R.S. 48:1308 and other constitutional and statutory authority supplemental thereto, be authorized to renew the levy and collection of a tax of five (5) mills (an estimated $29,008 is reasonably anticipated to be collected for an entire year) of assessed valuation on all property subject to taxation in said District, for an additional period of ten (10) years, commencing with the year 2013 and ending with the year 2022, for the purpose of providing and maintaining electric lights on the streets, roads, highways, alleys and public places in said Road Lighting District?
